title: TRISTINA PLZ READ
body:
how come when I type in the tristina code it doesn't work like legit I've tried many stuff nothing works plz look into this.
every time I try to get the skin and the champ it doesn't work I liked your Facebook page already gives me the code but it doesn't work.
Is It about my level or what?

replies.body:
Have you confirmed that you used the promotion for the OCE region rather than the NA or EUW regions, for instance?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202083184-Promotional-Content-Free-Swag-#h2q1
